languages.text: "Когда-то ты и сам{mf||а} был{mf||а} Лорд-капитаном — на собственном корабле. Тебе известно все о том, как живет этот огромный монстр с тысячами людей экипажа. Тебе известно, как прихотливы могут быть {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g}, как слабовольна чернь с нижних палуб, как одно тактическое решение может повернуть исход сражения. Это бесценный опыт, которым обладают немногие и который в моем ремесле ценится бесконечно высоко".

traits.locale_text: "Когда-то ты и сам{mf||а} был{mf||а} Лорд-капитаном — на собственном корабле. Тебе известно все о том, как живет этот огромный монстр с тысячами людей экипажа. Тебе известно, как прихотливы могут быть {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g}, как слабовольна чернь с нижних палуб, как одно тактическое решение может повернуть исход сражения. Это бесценный опыт, которым обладают немногие и который в моем ремесле ценится бесконечно высоко".

languages.text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."
languages.original_text: "Когда-то ты и сам{mf||а} был{mf||а} Лорд-капитаном — на собственном корабле. Тебе известно все о том, как живет этот огромный монстр с тысячами людей экипажа. Тебе известно, как прихотливы могут быть {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинные духи{/g}, как слабовольна чернь с нижних палуб, как одно тактическое решение может повернуть исход сражения. Это бесценный опыт, которым обладают немногие и который в моем ремесле ценится бесконечно высоко".

traits.locale_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and thousands of its crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak are the wills of the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought-after in my craft."

"You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and thousands of its crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak are the wills of the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought-after in my craft."

"You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

"You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

"You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

languages.text: “你自己就担任过领主舰长这一职责。你掌控着你自己的船，你了解这艘巨兽的性情，了解成千上万名船员的一切。你知道{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}可能会多么善变，熟知底层甲板的乌合之众意志有多么薄弱。你也很清楚，小小的战术决定便可以改变整场战斗的局势。很少有人能拥有这样的宝贵经验，而这样的经验在我们这行非常抢手。”
languages.original_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

traits.locale_text: “你自己就担任过领主舰长这一职责。你掌控着你自己的船，你了解这艘巨兽的性情，了解成千上万名船员的一切。你知道{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}可能会多么善变，熟知底层甲板的乌合之众意志有多么薄弱。你也很清楚，小小的战术决定便可以改变整场战斗的局势。很少有人能拥有这样的宝贵经验，而这样的经验在我们这行非常抢手。”

languages.text: «Tú también fuiste Lord Capitán de tu propia nave. Sabes todo lo que hay que saber sobre la vida de esta bestia colosal y sus miles de tripulantes. Sabes lo volubles que pueden ser los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g}, lo débil de voluntad que puede ser la chusma de las cubiertas inferiores y cómo una sola decisión táctica puede cambiar el curso de una batalla. Poca gente puede afirmar que tiene un experiencia tan necesaria y buscada en mi profesión».
languages.original_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

traits.locale_text: «Tú también fuiste Lord Capitán de tu propia nave. Sabes todo lo que hay que saber sobre la vida de esta bestia colosal y sus miles de tripulantes. Sabes lo volubles que pueden ser los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g}, lo débil de voluntad que puede ser la chusma de las cubiertas inferiores y cómo una sola decisión táctica puede cambiar el curso de una batalla. Poca gente puede afirmar que tiene un experiencia tan necesaria y buscada en mi profesión».

languages.text: 「あなた自身もかつてロード・キャプテンで、自分の船に乗っていた。だからこそ、この巨大な獣とその何千人ものクルーの生活について知るべきことをすべて知っている。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}がいかに気まぐれであるか、下層デッキの烏合の衆がどれほど意志が弱いか、そしてたった一つの戦術的決断がいかに戦局を左右しうるかを知っている。私の使命において、これほど求められる貴重な経験を持っていると主張できる人物はほとんどいない」
languages.original_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた自身もかつてロード・キャプテンで、自分の船に乗っていました。あなたはこの巨大な獣とその何千人ものクルーの人生について知るべきことをすべて知っています。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}がいかに気まぐれであるか、下デッキの烏合の衆がどれほど意志が弱いか、そしてたった一つの戦術的決断がいかに戦いの流れを変えることができるかを知っています。私の使命において強く求められる、そのような貴重な経験をしてきたと主張できる人はほとんどいません」

「あなた自身もかつてロード・キャプテンで、自分の船に乗っていた。だからこそ、この巨大な獣とその何千人ものクルーの生活について知るべきことをすべて知っている。あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}がいかに気まぐれであるか、下層デッキの烏合の衆がどれほど意志が弱いか、そしてたった一つの戦術的決断がいかに戦局を左右しうるかを知っている。私の使命において、これほど求められる貴重な経験を持っていると主張できる人物はほとんどいない」

languages.text: « Vous étiez vous-même {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} autrefois, à bord de votre propre vaisseau. Vous maîtrisez tous les aspects de la vie à bord de cette bête gargantuesque et de ses milliers de membres d'équipage. Vous savez que les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} peuvent être capricieux, que la populace des ponts inférieurs est veule et qu'une unique décision tactique peut changer le cours d'une bataille. Peu de gens peuvent se targuer de posséder ce genre d'expérience inestimable tant recherchée dans ma profession. »
languages.original_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

traits.locale_text: « Vous étiez vous-même {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} autrefois, à bord de votre propre vaisseau. Vous maîtrisez tous les aspects de la vie à bord de cette bête gargantuesque et de ses milliers de membres d'équipage. Vous savez que les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} peuvent être capricieux, que la populace des ponts inférieurs est veule et qu'une unique décision tactique peut changer le cours d'une bataille. Peu de gens peuvent se targuer de posséder ce genre d'expérience inestimable tant recherchée dans ma profession. »

languages.text: "Ihr wart selbst ein Lord Captain – an Bord Eures eigenen Schiffs. Ihr wisst alles, was es zu wissen gibt, wenn es um das Leben dieser riesigen Bestie und der Tausende von Crewmitgliedern geht. Ihr wisst, wie empfindlich {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} sein können, wie willensschwach der Pöbel auf den unteren Decks, und wie eine einzige taktische Entscheidung den Verlauf einer Schlacht herumreißen kann. Nur wenige haben so unbezahlbare Erfahrungen, die in meinem Metier derart gesucht sind."
languages.original_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart selbst ein Lord Captain – an Bord Eures eigenen Schiffs. Ihr wisst alles, was es zu wissen gibt, wenn es um das Leben dieser riesigen Bestie und der Tausende von Crewmitgliedern geht. Ihr wisst, wie empfindlich {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} sein können, wie willensschwach der Pöbel auf den unteren Decks, und wie eine einzige taktische Entscheidung den Verlauf einer Schlacht herumreißen kann. Nur wenige haben so unbezahlbare Erfahrungen, die in meinem Metier derart gesucht sind."

languages.text: "Eskiden sen de Lord Kaptan'dın... Kendi geminde tabii. Bu devasa canavarın ve binlerce tayfasının hayatı hakkında bilinebilecek her şeye hâkimsindir. {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Makine ruhlarının{/g} ne denli güvenilmez, alt güvertedeki ayaktakımınınsa ne denli zayıf iradeli olduğunu, tek bir taktiksel kararın koskoca bir muharebenin seyrini değiştirebildiğini biliyorsundur. Pek azları mesleğimde büyük rağbet gören bu paha biçilmez deneyime sahip olduğunu iddia edebilir."
languages.original_text: "You were once a Lord Captain yourself — aboard your own ship. You know everything there is to know about the life of this gargantuan beast and its thousands of crew members. You know how fickle {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} can be, how weak-willed are the rabble from the lower decks, how a single tactical decision can turn the tide of a battle. Few people can claim to have such priceless experience that is so highly sought after in my calling."
